alert.note: Alert for Broadwater; Gallatin; Jefferson; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 6:41PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Broadwater, northeastern Madison, southeastern Jefferson and northwestern Gallatin Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 640 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles northwest of Three Forks to near Harrison. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Three Forks, Harrison, Radersburg, Lewis And Clark Caverns State Park, Willow Creek, Madison Buffalo Jump State Park and Missouri Headwaters State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 262 and 280. Highway 12 between mile markers 96 and 109. Highway 287 between mile markers 68 and 97. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
